title: Alpha Class: Graduation
description:
Alpha Class is back–and this time they’ve brought their four-legged friends!
It’s the final term for Tina, Maxim, Yana, and Ron, along with many of the inaugural Etheric Academy Class, and in true Alpha Class style, it doesn’t take long for a mission for justice to turn into a real-life episode of Star Journey.
With the way back to Earth in ruins and graduation just around the corner, the students and their friends prepare to embark upon their greatest adventure yet—adulthood.

What will the future look like? More importantly, will they head into that future together?
author: N.D. Roberts
